name: NSAccessibilityCustomRotor
desc: A context-sensitive function that helps VoiceOver users find the next instance of a related accessibility element.

items.name: init(label: String, itemSearchDelegate: NSAccessibilityCustomRotorItemSearchDelegate)
items.desc: Creates a custom rotor with the specified label and item search delegate.

items.name: init(rotorType: NSAccessibilityCustomRotor.RotorType, itemSearchDelegate: NSAccessibilityCustomRotorItemSearchDelegate)
items.desc: Creates a custom rotor with the specified rotor type and item search delegate.

items.name: var itemSearchDelegate: NSAccessibilityCustomRotorItemSearchDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate for finding the next item result.

items.name: protocol NSAccessibilityCustomRotorItemSearchDelegate
items.desc: A delegate for a custom rotor that finds the next item result after performing a search with the specified search parameters.

items.name: var itemLoadingDelegate: NSAccessibilityElementLoading?
items.desc: The delegate for loading item results that donâ€™t have a backing UI element at loading time.

items.name: protocol NSAccessibilityElementLoading
items.desc: A role-based protocol that declares the minimum interface necessary for an accessibility element to support loading.

items.name: var type: NSAccessibilityCustomRotor.RotorType
items.desc: The type of content that the rotor represents.

items.name: enum NSAccessibilityCustomRotor.RotorType
items.desc: Constants that indicate the type of content that the rotor represents.

items.name: var label: String
items.desc: The localized label that assistive apps use to describe the custom rotor.
